samples.context: In the far reaches of the galaxy, the United Planets formed a vast alliance. For all members of the alliance, pledging loyalty implied that if they faced invasion, then they would receive military aid.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all members of the alliance, if a member pledges loyalty and faces invasion, then they will receive military aid?

samples.context: In the sprawling metropolis of Tech City, innovation was valued above all. For all companies in the city, having a strong research division implied that if they filed a patent, then they would lead the industry.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all companies in Tech City, if a company has a strong research division and files a patent, then it will lead the industry?

samples.context: In the mystical land of Avalon, magic was everywhere. For all sorcerers in the kingdom, mastering the elemental spells implied that if the precise incantations were recited, then power was unleashed.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all sorcerers in the kingdom, if a sorcerer has mastered the elemental spells and recites the precise incantations, then power is unleashed?

samples.context: In the far reaches of the Andromeda galaxy, advanced civilizations thrived. For all planets in the Andromeda system, possessing interstellar technology implied that if they could travel faster than light, then communication was instantaneous.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all planets in the Andromeda system, if a planet possesses interstellar technology and can travel faster than light, then communication is instantaneous?

samples.context: In the prestigious institution of Wellington Academy, excellence was paramount. For all students at the academy, being an honors student implied that if they took advanced classes, then they would gain early acceptance to top universities.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all students at Wellington Academy, if a student is an honors student and takes advanced classes, then they will gain early acceptance to top universities?

samples.context: In the sprawling metropolis of Tech City, innovation thrived. For all startups in the city, having a unique product implied that if they attracted venture capital investment, then they would scale quickly.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all startups in the city, if a startup has a unique product and attracts venture capital investment, then it will scale quickly?

samples.context: In the futuristic city of Utopia, robots served humans. For all robots in the city, being programmed for a task implied that if they were given a command, then they would execute it efficiently.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all robots in Utopia, if a robot is programmed for a task and given a command, then it will execute it efficiently?

samples.context: In the prestigious Hero Academy, aspiring heroes trained hard. For all students at the academy, passing the combat exams implied that if they mastered their quirks, then they would graduate.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all students at the academy, if a student passes the combat exams and masters their quirk, then they will graduate?

samples.context: In the bustling port city of Maritime, sailing was a way of life. For all sailors in the port, being experienced implied that if they were recruiting crew, then many would apply.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all sailors in Maritime, if a sailor is experienced and recruiting crew, then many will apply?

samples.context: In the kingdom of Melodia, music was sacred. For all musicians in the royal orchestra, being selected as a soloist implied that if they composed an original piece, then they would perform it at the yearly recital.
samples.question: Does it entail that for all musicians in the royal orchestra, if a musician is selected as a soloist and composes an original piece, then they will perform it at the yearly recital?
